Key Match Events: South Africa scored a 2-0 victory over Morocco
Achraf Hakimi missed a penalty for Morocco
Sofyan Amrabat was sent off for a professional foul
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa will play Cape Verde in the quarter-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Morocco have not won the Africa Cup of Nations since 1976
Morocco were among the favourites at the tournament but their continental curse continues
Others: The match was played in the Laurent Pokou Stadium in San Pedro
The first half was devoid of many clearcut chances
Mali are seeking their first continental title
